tuv.seg: "Cognitive business is at the nexus of exploiting digital transformation and digital intelligence powered by capabilities like Watson," he said.
"Cognitive business is at the nexus of exploiting digital transformation and digital intelligence powered by capabilities like Watson,"他說.
Understandably, Picciano touted IBM's Watson cognitive computing capabilities as a way to achieve this goal.
理所當然地, Picciano將IBM Watson的認知計算能力吹捧為達成該目標的一種方法.
